body_html:
I have fixed Dockerfile.gpu to use the compute capability, and Linux GPU tests are now passing. The status of the MacOS CPU Tests is still "Waiting for status to be reported." Are those tests stalled?

This PR itself is ready. There is a bit of work I need to do internally to allow this PR to be correctly imported into the internal repo before we can merge this.

body:
I have fixed Dockerfile.gpu to use the compute capability, and Linux GPU tests are now passing. The status of the MacOS CPU Tests is still "Waiting for status to be reported." Are those tests stalled?

This PR itself is ready. There is a bit of work I need to do internally to allow this PR to be correctly imported into the internal repo before we can merge this.
